metadata.title: CVE-2023-30798 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
There MultipartParser usage in Encode's Starlette python framework beforeversions 0.25.0 allows an unauthenticated and remote attacker to specifyany number of form fields or files which can cause excessive memory usageresulting in denial of service of the HTTP service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-30798` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-starlette - 0.25.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: starlette package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.25.0-2').
